CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Notably , the longer the alkyl side chain , the closer the polymer aligned through π-π stacking is , which is attributed to the stronger interchain interactions of long alkyl side chains.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer |
| alkyl side chains |
| long alkyl side chains |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. polymer
2. alkyl side chains
3. long alkyl side chains

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. polymer

The other entities, "alkyl side chains" and "long alkyl side chains," are not "Material Name" entities as they are components or features of the polymer material, not the material itself.
